    About

    • Name: Mike Hinkle
    • Location: Burgundy, France
    • Email: michael0745@protonmail.com
    • Education: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
    • HW Daily Driver: System76 Serval, AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
    • OS of Choice: GNU/Linux (currently POP!_OS)
    • Databases: Oracle, PostgresQL & InfluxDB
    • Languages: Python, R, C, Bash, Perl, SQL, Flux, etc...
    • Libraries: Pandas, Scikit-learn, Dash, fbProphet, etc...
    • Employment Status: Currently seeking employment

    More about me …

    My concentration at University was in microelectronics. This involved study in device physics, digital logic, analog & IC design, C, C++, FPGA’s, MCU’s, advanced mathematics, etc.. I was a semiconductor engineer before moving to France in June of 2021. My hobby for years now has revolved around big data, analytics, observability, data visualization, etc… I am passionate about almost everything tech and find joy in solving great problems.
